name: No Water In Hell (itch)
description:
No Water in Hell is a roguelite dungeon crawler under development by CaffNight Software, a small team of friends. 

You play as a firefighter trapped in hell. Refusing to stay trapped in hell, you decide to escape hell. Unfortunately for you, there is only one way to do that--delve through the circles of hell and kill the devil. He who kills the devil will gain the power to escape hell! Armed with only a firehose and your wits, you'll face all sorts of monsters and minions the Devil sends at you. You'll die again and again, kill minions over and over, and drench your foes in brutal fashion on your runs to conquer hell. 

    

This current build is an early demo of the final product which will eventually be released to Steam. We'll keep you posted on more news on development as we continue and we hope you enjoy the taste of it we have so far!

Join our Discord for updates!
